teamlist.name: Colin Page
teamlist.bio: I'm a gameplay programmer studying Computer Science at Drexel. I love messing around with experimental game prototypes and trying to make weird mechanics fun. I enjoy puzzles and playing competitive team games.

teamlist.name: Ethan Whiting
teamlist.bio: I study Game Design and Production at Drexel with a minor in Entrepreneurship. I enjoy running project management with an inclusive attitude to keep the team moving forward!

teamlist.name: Miguel Geniza
teamlist.bio: Hi! I'm a 5/5 Computer Science major and also music and sound engineer!

teamlist.name: Thomas Ludin
teamlist.bio: Howdy! I am a Game Design and Production major doing marketing for this project!

teamlist.name: Owen Mearns
teamlist.bio: I'm a student at Drexel University studying Game Design and Production with a minor in CS. I Enjoy 3D and Environment Art

teamlist.name: Rui Huang
teamlist.bio: My major is Computer Science with a concentration in Game Programming and Development. I enjoy software architecture design.

teamlist.name: Quinn Alpern
teamlist.bio: I'm an artist, writer, and planner studying game design and production, working on production and marketing for the team!

teamlist.name: Jordyn Morris
teamlist.bio: Game Design and Production Major at Drexel University. I'm one of our teams artists!

teamlist.name: Nick Hom
teamlist.bio: I'm a Senior studying Computer Science, working on game design and gameplay programming. My favorite games are ones with low skill floors and high skill ceilings!

teamlist.name: Quinn Williams
teamlist.bio: I'm a junior game design student whose focus is animation and programming!

teamlist.name: Carolina Escobar
teamlist.bio: Junior Game Design and Production Student at Drexel. I love working on character designs and 2-D art.

teamlist.name: Adrian Bernales
teamlist.bio: I'm a Junior Game Design student that loves doing character design and 2D art!

teamlist.name: Braden Kovalovich
teamlist.bio: I'm a Junior GDAP student who loves using code to solve game design problems! I like working on unique games with unique voices.

teamlist.name: Leah Jorge
teamlist.bio: If you've scrolled this far, hello! I'm a CS major with a concentration in Game Programming and Development. I'm also responsible for the backend code for this site!
